text.quote: 000: Schedule 1, page 22, line 12, leave out “condition” and insert “requirement”

000: Schedule 2, page 24, line 9, at end insert—
“( ) Section 219(1)(b) applies as if the reference to the responsible officer were to the supervisor.”
